item.title: Prof. Serge Ferrari
item.description: Key Opinion Leader (KOL) in osteoporosis and metabolic bone diseases, Prof. Serge Ferrari is a renowned clinical researcher at the University of Geneva, Switzerland.

item.title: Dr. Amit Singh
item.description: Dr. Amit Singh is a bioinformatic data scientist. He holds a bachelor’s degree in Physics and a master’s degree in Biochemistry.

item.title: Prof. Alessandro Angelini
item.description: Expert in peptide design and formulation, Co-Founder and CSO at Arzanya, and researcher at the European Center for Living Technology, Ca’ Foscari University of Venice, Italy.

item.title: Rob Chisholm
item.description: Rob Chisholm is an accomplished biopharmaceutical executive with over 25 years of global industry experience, specializing in bringing innovative therapies to market for patients with serious medical conditions.

item.title: Prof. Iván Durán
item.description: Expert on rare bone disease and creating research animal models for studying rare bone disease. University of Malaga, Spain.

item.title: Prof. Anjali Kusumbe
item.description: Prof. Anjali Kusumbe is a vascular biologist and expert in bone vasculature, ageing, and tissue regeneration.

item.title: Dr. Gwang Jin Kim
item.description: Dr. Gwang Jin Kim is a specialist in search engine optimization and digital strategy, ensuring that Nimverta’s scientific mission and message reach a global audience.

item.title: Prof. Lothar Seefried
item.description: Leading clinician and researcher in the field of rare bone diseases, metabolic bone disorders, and orthopedic surgery and key opinion leader.

item.title: Prof. Shubhendu Palei
item.description: Expert in chemical biology and synthetic biology, with a focus on the design and development of bioactive molecules, peptide therapeutics, and chemical probes for biomedical applications.

item.title: Nimverta Secures Venture Kick Support to Advance Bone Regeneration Therapy
item.description: Nimverta, a Zurich-based biotech startup, has secured CHF 10,000 in funding from Venture Kick, entering a new phase in its journey to develop first-in-class peptide therapies for bone regeneration.
